name: Azamar - The Role Playing Game - A Cinema6 and OpenD6 RPG Experience
blurb: Azamar, an epic, high-magic, fantasy, role-playing game experience involving a world struggling to recover from the horrible Fracturing and Great War.

rewards.reward: At this pledge level you get access to all the messages sent to all the other pledge levels and will get access to our forums in the finalizing days before we print and publish out.  AS WELL, at this pledge level, you will have an OPT IN ability, allowing you to pre-order the Azamar Sourcebook, and then decide if you are still interested in the Lifetime Membership currently offered with these pledges (mentioned at the $300.00 level).  If you OPT IN to the Lifetime Membership with Wicked North Games later on the price will be the same minus the cost you have paid as part of your pledge, however payment will be handled separately since the project with kickstarter will be over.
Full Color PDF of Azamar Sourcbook with early electronic copy ISBN
Same as all above, mentioned in all future Wicked North Games publications as a sponsor, one (1) soft bound, first print copy of Azamar (with ISBN), one (1) limited edition Azamar six-sided die.

Same as all above, and entry into our drawing for one (1) signed artwork piece from one of our artists, one (1) limited edition hard cover (signed or not), and one (1) signed full-color poster.  This drawing is for the entire package described here and it will go to one pledge at this level.
Same as all above, and full color limited edition poster (11"x17"), and three (3) limited edition Azamar dice, (totaling four (4) dice from all previous pledge levels).

Same as all above, + Signed or not, Limited Edition, Hard Cover copy of Azamar The Role Playing Game Sourcebook, and two (2) limited edition Azamar dice (totaling six (6) dice from all previous pledge levels)

Same as all above, You will be able to dictate a Featured Hero or Villain in the Azamar Sourcebook, Caricature Artwork for that Hero or Villain with the original sent to you, Advance Copy of Westward The Role Playing Game (our next project) in Full Color PDF, ISBn'd version, Posters Above now signed, Sponsor indication in all future Wicked North Games publications upgraded to Producer

Same as all above, You will be able to dictate a Featured Deity or Demigod in the Azamar Sourcebook who will have great influence in Azamar and featured in the Pantheon section, Caricature Artwork for that Deity or Demigod with the original sent to you.  The first person to pledge at this level will also get an extra world map poster of Azamar, a large 24"x32" glossy poster.

At this pledge level, we offer Wicked North Games Lifetime Memberships, this entitles you to a lifetime of soft-cover printed books from us each time they are published and released, completely free of charge, as well as the electronic versions when they release, too (also free).  Think of it - every copy of everything we create and publish down the road - FREE.  This is a one time deal, and Lifetime Memberships with Wicked North Games will never be offered again!
